articles.author: Ian Curran
articles.title: Man-made 'space junk' is already making it more difficult to explore the final frontier - thejournal.ie
articles.description: So what are organisations like the European Space Agency doing about it?
articles.content:
WHEN AMATEUR IRISH astronomer John Flannery first took an interest in the hobby as a child, space was a much cleaner place than it is in 2021.
Thanks to human activity, there are now hundreds of tho… [+9879 chars]
